featured_projects.name: YangTu
featured_projects.description: A service platform that enables users to order home cleaning and shopping delivery services in a single app. Users can choose to be Jalu (service requester) or Yusa (task performer).
featured_projects.littleNote: a bit challenging to implement complex application available on both web and mobile version in only 2 weeks on a team of 6 (3 Frontend and 3 Backend)

featured_projects.name: FitMeLook
featured_projects.description: A mobile app that provides personalized outfit suggestions using AI. The app analyzes facial features and seasonal colors to recommend the best fashion choices for women.
featured_projects.littleNote: a bit challenging due to we start from problem > data > solution > problem solving.

featured_projects.name: LingoLandSaga
featured_projects.description: A real-time web game designed to help users improve their typing speed through fun and competitive gameplay. Players can practice typing while competing with others online.
featured_projects.littleNote: it was fun implementing real-time socket connection web apps

projects.name: (Current) Portfolio Website
projects.description: A simple portfolio website. This project was created to help me hone my Next.js competencies.

projects.name: MauMelali
projects.description: MauMelali is a company to help and guide you on finding the most amazing experiences available when visiting europe. I made their responsive website pages and their web server for blogging purposes.

projects.name: YangTu
projects.description: A service platform that enables users to order home cleaning and shopping delivery services in a single app. Users can choose to be Jalu (service requester) or Yusa (task performer). This app provides flexibility and convenience for both parties, creating an efficient and user-friendly experience for daily needs.

projects.name: Idolniso
projects.description: An e-commerce website for fans to buy merchandise related to their favorite idols. This project was created to explore Next.js and build a smooth, responsive online shopping experience.

projects.name: Idolstagram
projects.description: A mobile app inspired by Instagram, created for idol fans to connect and share content. Built to learn mobile app development, it provides an interactive experience for users interested in idols.

projects.name: LingoLandSaga
projects.description: A real-time web game designed to help users improve their typing speed through fun and competitive gameplay. Players can practice typing while competing with others online.

projects.name: Roastify
projects.description: A fun app that uses AI to roast users based on their Spotify profiles, artists, or albums with creative and humorous comments. It provides an entertaining way to engage with music preferences.

projects.name: Restaurant App
projects.description: A simple restaurant app, developed for the purpose of learning while in Hacktiv8.

projects.name: Simple Social Media Web App
projects.description: A social media platform designed for people with similar interests. It prioritizes user privacy by allowing members to create custom personas, ensuring a privacy-first experience while connecting with like-minded individuals.

projects.name: Krusty Krab Fun Minigame
projects.description: A fun minigame web app where you play as an outsource worker. This project was built for Hacktiv8 Phase 0 Hackathon.

projects.name: FitMeLook
projects.description: A mobile app that provides personalized outfit suggestions using AI. The app analyzes facial features and seasonal colors to recommend the best fashion choices for women.

projects.name: PDF Scraper
projects.description: This is a one-sitting-fun-project-scripts that scrapes PDF files from a website (my case was https://peraturan.go.id) and downloads them locally. It utilizes Node.js with Cheerio for HTML parsing and Axios for making HTTP requests.

projects.name: Simple Personal Website
projects.description: A responsive personal website. This project was built for Dicoding course submission.

projects.name: Kang Haerin Fan Website
projects.description: A responsive fan website made for NewJeans Kang Haerin. This project was built for Dicoding course submission.

projects.name: CRUD App
projects.description: a simple app for creating, read, update, and delete data developed with Java. This project was built for Pemrograman Berbasis Penggunaan Ulang class

projects.name: Lib-Karangturi
projects.description: Lib-Karangturi was a project that I built during the Mahasiswa Mengabdi 1000 Desa program. It is an app designed to be used for publishing informations regarding Karangturi village's Library Community.

projects.name: Expense Manager App
projects.description: a simple app to manage your expenses. Developed with Java. This project was built for Pemrograman Berbasis Penggunaan Ulang class

projects.name: Notes App API
projects.description: a RESTful API for creating, read, update, and delete data about notes. This project was built for Dicoding course submission

projects.name: Bookshelf API
projects.description: a RESTful API for creating, read, update, and delete data about books. This project was built for Dicoding course submission

projects.name: Todoo
projects.description: To-do list web app.

projects.name: RehatQ
projects.description: RehatQ is a platform for helping you to have a better mental health. This project was built for Basic User Interface Design class.
